^ Sorry if the download goes too slow for you. Google is not user friendly while being a privacy nightmare. MEGA requires a subscription to download 10.8GB. Microsoft makes OneDrive a privacy nightmare when registering an account and logging in. Yandex is a privacy nightmare when registering an account and logging in to use its cloud service. So, this is why I resort to using zachowajto.pl because it has its own contact page while not being a privacy nightmare. It's getting harder to find privacy-friendly platforms not requiring payment for large file uploads.
